Brave.Name: Brave
Brave.Cmd: sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https curl gnupg lsb-release -y && curl -fsSL https://brave.com/cn/brave-browser.asc | sudo apt-key add - && echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://brave.com/cn/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/brave-browser.list && sudo apt update && sudo apt install brave-browser

Chrome.Name: Chrome
Chrome.Cmd: sudo apt install wget -y && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && sudo dpkg -i google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb

Opera.Name: Opera
Opera.Cmd: wget -qO - https://deb.opera.com/archive.key | sudo apt-key add - && sudo sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://deb.opera.com/stable/ stable non-free" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/opera.list' && sudo apt update && sudo apt install opera-stable
Opera.Description: A web browser with built-in ad blocking and VPN features.

Tor.Name: Tor Browser
Tor.Description: A privacy-focused web browser that uses the Tor network.

VSCode.Name: Visual Studio Code
VSCode.Description: A source-code editor developed by Microsoft.

SublimeText.Name: Sublime Text
SublimeText.Description: A sophisticated text editor for code, markup, and prose.

Atom.Name: Atom
Atom.Cmd: sudo apt install snapd -y && sudo apt update && sudo snap install atom --classic -y
Atom.Description: A hackable text editor for the 21st century.

PyCharm.Name: PyCharm
PyCharm.Cmd: sudo mv /etc/apt/preferences.d/nosnap.pref ~/Documents/nosnap.backup && sudo apt update && sudo apt install snapd -y && sudo snap install pycharm-community --classic
PyCharm.Description: Python IDE for professional developers by JetBrains.

GIMP.Name: GIMP
GIMP.Description: A free and open-source image editor.

VLC.Name: VLC Media Player
VLC.Description: A free and open-source cross-platform multimedia player.

Thunderbird.Name: Thunderbird
Thunderbird.Description: A free and open-source email client.

BleachBit.Name: BleachBit
BleachBit.Description: A free and open-source disk space cleaner and privacy manager.

Blender.Name: Blender
Blender.Description: A free and open-source 3D creation suite.

Streamio.Name: Streamio
Streamio.Description: A media center for watching movies and TV shows.

Steam.Name: Steam
Steam.Description: A digital distribution platform for video games.

Discord.Name: Discord
Discord.Description: A communication app for gamers with voice, video, and text chat.
